column3: p1_0001: "Don't know what it's supposed to do"
p2_0002: "Buttons weren't very responsive and gave no indication they were working" + p3_0003: "Had to click save a couple of times"

column1: Could only scroll page with keyboard in one direction
column3: p2_0002: "When cycling with Tab, if you missed something you had to go all the way round"

column1: Easy to accidentally click delete after saving an edit
column3: p3_0003: "Mouse would hover over 'delete' after 'save' from editing"

column1: User can't see how many tasks they have
column3: p5_0005: "Doesn't say how many tasks there are"

column1: User can't easily tell if filter has been applied
column3: p5_0005: "When I filtered the tasks I didn't actually know that it worked" + p5_0005: "If it said for example filtering 4 out of 10 tasks that would be nice"

column1: When deleting a task, the screen reader read out the URL of the codespace
column3: p5_0005: "Screen reader should not read random crap, a bunch of random numbers is confusing"
